You are majestic, and the power that you have is
[MET] a robe that a king wears.
You put the world firmly in place, and it will never be moved/shaken.
You ruled as king a very long time ago;
when you created the world, you separated
the chaotic mass and formed oceans
and the waves of the waters
you are greater than the roar of those oceans,
more powerful than the ocean waves!
You are Yahweh, the one who is greater than any other god!
and your temple has always been holy/sacred.
And that will be true forever.
